title: Pixel 5 - no sound on calls / WhatsApp unless I turn the speaker on
content:
Hi everyone,

Got my new Pixel 5 less than a month ago. Transferred all the data from Pixel 3. Couple weeks ago I encountered the following problem: I can't hear any sound when on the call except when I turn the speaker on. My counterpart can hear me fine. The same issue seems to be happening with any other messenger (e.g. WhatsApp).

- Boot in safe mode, this helps so the problem should be in one of the apps. I uninstalled all the recent apps, doesn't help
- Removed permissions to access "Phone" from all the apps (except for the system ones from which I cannot remove it). Didn't help.
- Reboot helps but just for some time. Several hours later the problem is back. So the "internal speaker" itself seems to be ok.
- Not related to bedtime / do not disturb as I turned it off.

So far very disappointed. All the same apps were working fine on my Pixel 3.

Has anyone experienced anything similar?
